name: XorFilter
description: The XorFilter class is a logical filter that combines two filters using boolean XOR (exclusive OR) logic. It allows for sophisticated filtering conditions where exactly one of the component filters must return true.
overview: The XorFilter implements exclusive OR logic for precise filtering control. It returns true only when exactly one of the filters returns true, making it perfect for scenarios requiring mutual exclusion. It supports any generic type T that the component filters can handle and implements a fluent interface inherited from BasicFilter.

constructors.description: Creates a new XorFilter that combines two filters with XOR logic.

methods.name: apply
methods.description: Applies the XOR filter logic to an object. Returns true only when exactly one of the two filters returns true for the given object.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The object to test against both filters
